titleStmt.title: The confession of faith and catechisms, agreed upon by the assembly of divines at Westminster together with their humble advice concerning church government and ordination of ministers.
Westminster Confession of Faith.
The confession of faith and catechisms, agreed upon by the assembly of divines at Westminster together with their humble advice concerning church government and ordination of ministers.
Westminster Confession of Faith.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, at the Sign of the Kings Head in Pauls Church yard,

notesStmt.note: "Propositions concerning church-government and ordination of ministers" has separate title page dated 1648; register and pagination are separate.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
